name: LasSecret
description:
Game made for webmonetization game jam.

LasSecret is roguelike that take place in forest.

We decided to make rougelike,because player can play game multiple times and he won't get bored. 

LasSecret PlayerControl

Player control is in about tab, but just for sake that everybody know how to play.

You can use SPACE to dodge bullets.

Moving W A S D.

E interaction.

LEFT MOUSE BUTTON  use sword.

M map.

There was also minimap but currently it isn't working.

Developers:

-MatherPL

-SeprAY

Graphics:

-SeprAY

Plans for the future

We may work on game in future, if people will like idea of the game.

If you do, then you can  leave a comment or rate our game.

So we are waiting for feedback if it will be good we might further develop LasSecret and publish it commercially.
